SVGElementSwitch.summary: The <switch> SVG element evaluates any requiredFeatures, requiredExtensions and systemLanguage attributes on its direct child elements in order, and then renders the first child where these attributes evaluate to true.

remarks.para: Other direct children will be bypassed and therefore not rendered. If a child element is a container element, like g, then its subtree is also processed/rendered or bypassed/not rendered.

blockquote.para: Note: The display and visibility properties have no effect on <switch> element processing. In particular, setting display:none on a child has no effect on the true/false testing for <switch> processing.
